ygData.subject: Re: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Twinking has never really bothered me, I try not to be jealous of other folks goodies. If they feel better by having better stuff, then I think they are just
ygData.messageBody:
Twinking has never really bothered me, I try not
to be jealous of other folks goodies. If they feel
better by having better stuff, then I think they are
just compensating for inadequecy. If they use their
twinkings for the good of the group, then I am good with
it. I think that powerleveling is more disruptive
than twinking. When you get a level 20 warrior that
can't taunt, or a cleric that doesn't know about
certain beneficial spells (stun and fear come to mind) or
a bard that is still singing the level 1 song (or
better yet, never bought any), then you find yourself
getting killed because of idiocy. <br><br>Nukai Oakenwulf
